author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Mark CUDA kernels in shared libraries as having default visibility, so they can be used by other executables, libraries or plugins.

The default linkage of CUDA kernels changed from public to private in CUDA 13.0, and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/9679 adopts the new behaviour already for CUDA 12.9.

#### PR validation:

Fixes the unit tests that are failing in the IBs.
title: Explicitly export CUDA kernels in shared libraries
